content: MT-FPS-FZL Fixpoint connector Outdoor coated (OC) bracket for fastening MP-PS pipe shoes to Hilti MT modular girders as fixpoint in mildly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features One-step installation – easy and quick fastening using Hilti MT thread-forming bolts Simpler method – suitable for single pipe clamp pipe shoes in combination with 100 or 150mm wide MT modular girders Safer jobsites – avoid welding and drilling Easier to install – slotted anchor holes to simplify pipe shoe positioning and fastening Applications Installing fixed points with MP-PS pipe shoes on Hilti MT modular girders Recommended for use in Indoor or Outdoor with low to moderate pollution (C3) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: S235JR - Yield280 Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Material thickness: 5 mm Technical Data | Material composition | S235JR - Yield280 | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Material thickness | 5 mm | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2331077 - Fixpoint for MT-80 long side, MT-90, and MT-100 - Package Size 2 pc
